text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Trump “What the hell do you have to lose?”
Growing evidence shows the answer is their LIVES. Clinical trials, academic research and scientific analysis and VA indicate the danger of hydroxychloroquine is DEATH. Sending  hydroxychloroquine to India too ? https://t.co/b5LHpHZS9W
